label: ProcessCertificate
comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a process has met required criteria.

datatypeProperties.comment: A process certification applicable to this process certificate.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a process.

referencedBy.comment: A process certificate applicable to this specified crop protection treatment.
A process certificate obtained by means of this specified inspection result.
A process certificate for this specified chemical treatment.
